title: I’m Just This ‘Sue’ - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Confinement   Cute Protagonist   Ghosts   Handsome Male Lead   Kidnappings   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Omegaverse   Possessive Characters   R*pe   Showbiz   System Administrator   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: Gu Zheng   故筝
description:
After his death, Hang Qing got a system that allowed him to release the halo of Gary Stu (aka. Mary Sue) and conquer the villain in every world.

 

You have an unparalleled appearance, a charming body, and an irresistible voice. Is conquering a villain that difficult?

 

But I’m a f*cking man.

 

It doesn’t matter if you get bent a little, you’ll get used to it.>
